description: Number of regions of linearity for Lusztig's piecewise-linear function in type A_n.
comments: Lusztig's piecewise-linear function is of interest because it appears to be related to a description of the canonical basis of the quantized enveloping algebra U^+(sl_{n+1}).
references: J. W. Cockerton, "Canonical bases and piecewise-linear combinatorics", Ph.D., Warwick, 1995
author: _Richard M. Green_, Oct 04 2000
